sentences.english: Can you spell mousetrap with three letters ?
sentences.chinese: 妳能拼出三個字母的捕鼠器嗎？

sentences.english: The rat-catcher can't catch caught rats.
sentences.chinese: 捕鼠器不能捕捉已被逮住的老鼠。

sentences.english: They used the money to establish a factory to build the traps.
sentences.chinese: 他們用這筆錢建起了一家生產捕鼠器的工廠。

sentences.english: The farmer sets traps to catch rats.
sentences.chinese: 這個農夫用捕鼠器捕捉老鼠。

sentences.english: Sethu Sethunarayanan worked with a mechanical engineer to design a steel trap.
sentences.chinese: 他與一位機械工程師合作，設計了一種鋼質捕鼠器。

sentences.english: With the new traps, rat catchers still blow into rat barrows .
sentences.chinese: 用新的捕鼠器，捕鼠者仍然可以讓煙進入地洞。

sentences.english: As a critic complained , his shops were like mousetraps .
sentences.chinese: 一個評論家抱怨，格倫設計的商店像是捕鼠器。

sentences.english: Theyuseused the money to establish a factory to build the traps. It employs 50 women.
sentences.chinese: 他們用這筆錢建起了一家生產捕鼠器的工廠。

sentences.english: What are you gonna do with the mousetraps, Mom?
I saw a cat caught in a trap.
sentences.chinese: 我看見一隻老鼠陷在捕鼠器裏。

sentences.english: VOICE: Most paperweights don't look anything like part of a mousetrap.
sentences.chinese: 大多數紙鎮都不像捕鼠器裏面的一部分。

sentences.english: Building a better mousetrap, one raindrop at a time.
sentences.chinese: 建設一個更美好的捕鼠器，一個雨滴的時間。

definition: Doll's House (1879), drama by Ibsen 易卜生
to lure into a trap/to trap/to capture
Les Misérables (1862) by Victor Hugo 維克多·雨果|维克多·雨果[Wei2 ke4 duo1 · Yu3 guo3]
Taming of the Shrew, play by William Shakespeare
